titleStmt.title: The naked truth, in an essay upon trade with some proposals for bringing the ballance on our side : humbly offered to the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Blanch, John, b. 1649 or 50.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Blanch by BM, NUC pre-1956 Suppl., and Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
